main event: A round object which changed color rapidly was observed over the Mojave desert, moving across the sky before shooting straight down.
interesting points: The object was sighted from a distance of 40-50 miles altitude., It changed color from light yellow to light silver every two seconds., The witness estimated the object's size to be 25 or 30 feet in diameter., The object left a vapor trail or streak behind it when it disappeared., The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes and involved a telescope for closer observation.
witness description: Mr. ------, his wife, and another couple were present during the sighting.
